The vax doesn't work. That should have been the end of it - but it wasn't. The abrupt resignations of top FDA immunologists last month failed to stop it too. As did all the sudden deaths of young people.

Occams razor. The simplest explanation is usually the correct one. "Every government party involved has been bought". Follow the money and job offers. Everything you need to know.

Once you believe this, pushing back becomes easy. No matter what they take or threaten to take from you.

The saddest part about this? Besides all the lives they've ruined? By denying complete failure, they delay any hope of finding a working solution. 

While the vaccine alternates do work, they are only slightly effective. So finding that real fix is quite important.
